The All-new Peugeot 2008 GT 1.2 delivers masterful power and efficiency. It has a striking front grille, a horizontal bonnet, raised ground clearance and an enhanced and sophisticated design.
Be the first in your city to hit the road in Peugeots latest and greatest creation. This vehicle is spacious and has a sleek interior just what you and your family needs. It gives excellent fuel consumption, driving pleasure and great performance. 
This great vehicle comes with a 5 year or 100 000kms warranty and a 3 year or 60 000kms service plan.
